mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.songlist_name, c.like_numbers, c.introduction, d.songNum FROM t_user a INNER JOIN t_user_songlist b ON a.id = #{value } AND a.id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN t_songlist c ON b.songlist_id = c.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT songlist_id, count( 1 ) songNum FROM t_songlist_song GROUP BY songlist_id ) d ON d.songlist_id = c.id;
